text: Butcher of Praag
The scourge of Kislev, Butcher of Praag and feared one in the Old world.
Venturing further than most feared Chaos Champions, the chaos mutation take hold of most Engra's men.
Mutated Furs
Only the most crazed of marauders are found among Engra's warband.
Unrivalled Marauders
Granted by Asavar Kul, this token radiates dark and powerful energy.
Asavar Kul's Token
Channeled by his irreverent sword, Engra unleashes a wave of pure chaotic lightning and destruction.
Anomalous Lightning
Instruments of death are infused with rare magic harvested by the Kul.
Infused Instruments
The Sigil granted to the personal retinue of the Everchosen, a token of power amongst Chaos ranks.
Everchosen's Sigil
The Warband responsibile for much of the recruitment that later formed the herd of the end times.
Deathsword's Warband
One who has travelled the plains for centuries learn their deepest secrets.
Secrets of the Plains
The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.
Chaos Steed
